description.lang: The Multi sensor is designed for use with scenes in home automation systems, integrate motion, light, temperature and humidity sensors, powered by CR123A battery or USB cable. The Motion Sensor lets you know when movement is detected in a certain area and can trigger different actions in response to that movement (or lack of movement). It also lets you know the ambient temperature and humidity to trigger different actions to make you more comfort.

Z-Wave Plus Lifeline1. Notification Report.Sensor will send Notification Report when Motion Detection Unknown Location and (Event inactive).2. Multilevel Sensor ReportSensor will send Multilevel Sensor Report (Temperature, humidity, luminance) interval of 2 hours.3. Battery Report.Sensor will send Battery Report when the battery level is low and the battery reports value is 0xFF.4. Device Reset Locally.
Send Basic Set when PIR trigger
Low Battery Power Level of alarm threshold values: the value range are 10~50 for percentage, so the Battery Low Power level can setting 10%~50%.
Low Battery Power Level of alarm threshold values
Set 101 ~ 104 to default.
Set 101 ~ 104 to default.

name.lang: The interval time of sending the temperature reporting

description.lang: The interval time of sending the temperature reporting. if setting to 0 then the temperature reporting is disabled 1. Valid values: 0x00-0x28DE802. The minimum interval time is 1 minutes. For example, if the value is set to be more than 1 and less than 60, the interval time is 1 minutes, if the value is set to be more than 60 and less than 120, the interval time is 2 minutes.
the temperature reporting is disabled
The interval time of sending the temperature reporting is 31 days2678400 seconds

name.lang: The interval time of sending the humidity reporting.

description.lang: The interval time of sending the humidity reporting. if setting to 0 then the humidity reporting is disabled 1. Valid values: 0x00-0x28DE802. The minimum interval time is 1 minutes. For example, if the value is set to be more than 1 and less than 60, the interval time is 1 minutes, if the value is set to be more than 60 and less than 120, the interval time is 2 minutes.
the humidity reporting is disabled
The interval time of sending the humidity reporting is 31 days2678400 seconds

name.lang: The interval time of sending the luminance reporting.

description.lang: The interval time of sending the luminance reporting. if setting to 0 then the luminance reporting is disabled 1. Valid values: 0x00-0x28DE802. The minimum interval time is 1 minutes. For example, if the value is set to be more than 1 and less than 60, the interval time is 1 minutes, if the value is set to be more than 60 and less than 120, the interval time is 2 minutes.
the luminance reporting is disabled
The interval time of sending the luminance reporting is 31 days2678400 seconds

name.lang: The interval time of sending the battery level reporting.

description.lang: The interval time of sending the battery level reporting. if setting to 0 then the battery level reporting is disabled 1. Valid values: 0x00-0x28DE802. The minimum interval time is 1 minutes. For example, if the value is set to be more than 1 and less than 60, the interval time is 1 minutes, if the value is set to be more than 60 and less than 120, the interval time is 2 minutes.
the battery level reporting is disabled
The interval time of sending the battery level reporting is 31 days2678400 seconds

name.lang: Enable 111 ~ 114 temperature/humidity/luminance/ battery level change reporting.

description.lang: Enable 111 ~ 114 temperature/humidity/luminance/ battery level change reporting.0 = Unable1 = Enable
Unable
Enable

Turn on/off PIR 0x0A indicates the highest sensitivity, 0x00 means off PIR detection function.
0x0A indicates the highest sensitivity, 0x00 means off PIR detection function.

the waiting time of the PIR triggering

name.lang: Whether the BASIC SET command is sent after the PIR is triggered

description.lang: Whether the BASIC SET command is sent after the PIR is triggered
Unable
Enable

name.lang: PIR triggers the correspondence between the value of the Basic set and the PIR state

description.lang: PIR triggers the correspondence between the value of the Basic set and the PIR state, When value is 0x00 PIR triggers Send the basic set command 0xff PIR alarm release send the basic set command 0x00, otherwise PIR triggers send the basic set command 0x00 PIR alarm release send the basic set command 0xff.
PIR triggers Send the basic set command 0xff PIR alarm release send the basic set command 0x00
PIR triggers send the basic set command 0x00 PIR alarm release send the basic set command 0xff.
